document.full_text: david krejci scored the winning goal and tim thomas stopped 46 shots in a row as boston beat the flyers in philadelphia again in their eastern conference semifinal series.
document.title: bruins 3, flyers 2: bruins' goalie foils flyers again and again
lines_and_colors: david krejci scored the winning goal and tim thomas stopped 46 shots in a row as boston beat the flyers in philadelphia again in their eastern conference semifinal series.
